subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: With 10 lead changes in the second half, Shabazz Napier and Ryan Boatright led Connecticut past an athletic and young Indiana team to win the 2K Sports Classic at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: With 10 lead changes in the second half, Shabazz Napier and Ryan Boatright led Connecticut past an athletic and young Indiana team to win the 2K Sports Classic at Madison Square Garden.
